title: Ale Quest
description: 1075 AD. William the Conqueror’s army sits outside Norwich Castle, the siege of three months going nowhere fast.The men need ale, but there is none. One man can get it for them, Sir Peter Godfried.Sir Peter has the fate of the kingdom in his hands, and he can’t let his king down – that ale must be found! He sets out, and along the way he finds love, trouble, laughs, and a hideous plot to upend the kingdom in this humorous and edgy historical novella.
author: Greg Strandberg
